attributes.action: Reverse council powers to raid elderly homes to asses what care they can afford
attributes.background: Councils now have the right to raid your home force you into care and rob you of your savings and personal items going through your house and bank statements to asses level of care you can afford and take it directly from you or after you die seize control of your estate to get there costs back .

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly how you would like the law to be changed.
